00032 namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities

00034 
00035 /*! A class to provide checksum functions */
00036 class CheckSum
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         /*!
00040         * Computes a one's complement checksum.
00041         *
00042         * @param addr The memory address of the data.
00043         * @param size The number of bytes pointed to by the memory address.
00044         * @return The ones compliment checksum.
00045         */
00046         static u_int16_t OnesComplementCheckSum(void *addr, size_t size);
00047 };
